settings.help_text: If set the plugin will also filter posts containing plain text links in addition to filtering embedded text links.
If a new post is rejected, this warning message will be sent to the user. Place `%s` where you want to include the forbidden URL Scheme in the message.
settings.placeholder: E.g., Your post has been rejected by the Link Filter.
settings.default: Your post has been rejected by the Link Filter.

settings.help_text: If an existing post is modified and gets rejected, this warning message will be sent to the user. Place `%s` where you want to include the forbidden URL Scheme in the message.
settings.placeholder: E.g., Your edit has been rejected by the Link Filter.
settings.default: Your edit has been rejected by the Link Filter.

settings.help_text: The protocols to allow in a link, separated by commas. Capitalization and punctuation insensitive.
The protocols to allow in plain text, separated by commas. Capitalization and punctuation insensitive.
